etymology.description: semantic: 糸 ‘thread’ + abbreviated phonetic: 唯 (→ 隹).
etymology.interpretation: The silk/thread component points to meanings involving thread, rope, and binding or maintaining. 唯 (reduced to 隹) provides the sound wéi, reflecting an older phonetic series with OC *ɢʷi that aligns with the modern reading.
etymology.simplification: Simplified to 维 by reducing 糸 → 纟; the right component (隹 from 唯) was kept unchanged.

examples.chinese: 我们需要维持秩序(我們需要維持秩序)。
这个方案有助于维护公共安全(這個方案有助於維護公共安全)。
examples.pinyin: Zhège fāng'àn yǒu zhù yú wéihù gōnggòng ānquán.
examples.english: This plan helps maintain public safety.

examples.chinese: 这种材料的纤维很结实(這種材料的纖維很結實)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng cáiliào de xiānwéi hěn jiéshi.
examples.english: The fibers of this material are very strong.
